content: Chess is a gold mine very little explored in journalistic terms, given its captivating connections to science, art, and culture in general, and its huge number of fascinating characters.
translations: ita:Gli scacchi sono una miniera d'oro molto poco esplorata in termini giornalistici, visti i suoi accattivanti collegamenti
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
